text: thumb|former Miyama Town Hall was a town located in Asuwa District, Fukui Prefecture, Japan. As of 2003, the town had an estimated population of 5,044 and a density of 36.62 persons per km². The total area was 137.73 km². On February 1, 2006, Miyama, along with the town of Shimizu, and the village of Koshino (both from Nyū District), was merged into the expanded city of Fukui. Category:Dissolved municipalities of Fukui Prefecture Category:Fukui (city)
title: Miyama, Fukui
